function.help: Removes leading and trailing spaces from a string.

parameter.name: string
parameter.help: A string or a variable that contains one

function.name: ucase
function.help: Converts the alphabetic characters in a string to uppercase.

parameter.name: string
parameter.help: A string or a variable that contains one

function.name: urldecode
function.help: Decodes a URL-encoded string.

parameter.name: charset
parameter.help: The character encoding in which the string is encoded.

function.name: urlencodedformat
function.help: Generates a URL-encoded string. For example, it replaces spaces with %20, and non-alphanumeric characters with equivalent hexadecimal escape sequences. Passes arbitrary strings within a URL.

parameter.name: string
parameter.help: A string or a variable that contains one

parameter.name: charset
parameter.help: The character encoding in which the string is encoded.

function.name: urlsessionformat
function.help: Depending on whether a client computer accepts cookies, this function does the following: * If the client does not accept cookies: automatically appends all required client identification information to a URL * If the client accepts cookies: does not append information

parameter.name: requesturl
parameter.help: URL of a CFML page

function.name: val
function.help: Converts numeric characters that occur at the beginning of a string to a number. If conversion fails, returns zero.

parameter.name: string
parameter.help: A string or a variable that contains one

function.name: valuelist
function.help: Inserts a delimiter between each value in an executed query. CFML does not evaluate the arguments. A delimited list of the values of each record returned from an executed query

parameter.name: column
parameter.help: Name of an executed query and column. Separate query name and column name with a period.

parameter.name: delimiter
parameter.help: A delimiter character to separate column data items. Default: comma (,).

function.name: week
function.help: From a date/time object, determines the week number within the year. An integer in the range 1-53; the ordinal of the week, within the year.

parameter.name: date
parameter.help: A date/time object in the range 100 AD-9999 AD.

function.name: wrap
function.help: Wraps text so that each line has a specified maximum number of characters.

parameter.name: string
parameter.help: String or variable that contains one. The text to wrap.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.help: Positive integer maximum number of characters to allow on a line.

parameter.name: strip
parameter.help: whether to remove all existing newline and carriage return characters in the input string with spaces before wrapping the text. Default: False.

function.name: writeoutput
function.help: Appends text to the page-output stream. This function writes to the page-output stream regardless of conditions established by the cfsetting tag.

parameter.name: string
parameter.help: A string, or a variable that contains one

function.name: xmlchildpos
function.help: Gets the position of a child element within an XML document object. The position, in an XmlChildren array, of the Nth child that has the specified name.

parameter.name: elem
parameter.help: XML element within which to search

parameter.name: childname
parameter.help: XML child element for which to search

parameter.name: n
parameter.help: Index of XMLchild element for which to search

function.name: xmlelemnew
function.help: Creates an XML document object element

parameter.name: xmlobj
parameter.help: The name of an XML object. An XML document or an element.

parameter.name: childname
parameter.help: The name of the element to create. This element becomes a child element of xmlObj in the tree

function.name: xmlformat
function.help: Escapes special XML characters in a string, so that the string is safe to use with XML.

function.name: xmlnew
function.help: Creates an XML document object.

parameter.name: casesensitive
parameter.help: Determines how CFML processes the case of XML document object component identifiers

function.name: xmlparse
function.help: Converts an XML document that is represented as a string variable into an XML document object.

parameter.name: xmlstring
parameter.help: An XML document object string

parameter.name: casesensitive
parameter.help: maintains the case of document elements and attributes

parameter.name: xmldoc
parameter.help: XML document object

parameter.name: xpathstring
parameter.help: XPath expression

function.name: xmltransform
function.help: Applies an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) to an XML document object that is represented as a string variable. An XSLT converts an XML document to another format or representation by applying an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) stylesheet to it.

parameter.name: xmlstring
parameter.help: A string that represents the XML document, or a parsed object representation of it.

parameter.name: xslstring
parameter.help: XSLT transformation to apply.

function.name: year
function.help: From a date/time object, gets the year value.

function.name: yesnoformat
function.help: Yes, for a non-zero value; No, otherwise.

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: A number or Boolean value
